entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:36 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
